This project allows you to simply animated  your VectorDrawables. You just drop your VectorDrawables files (you can drop as many as you want), run the AnimatedVectorTool (command line tool), it generates the files for you. You copy paste those files in your res folder (main folder to be exact) and run your project. And it's done !
